scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:Core_FeaturedContentSlider_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
$core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('config.vm') $core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('load-custom.vm') $core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('load-features.vm') ## Hide if there are no featured content or custom content #if ((!$contentFeatures || $contentFeatures.Count == 0) && (!$customFeatures || $customFeatures.Count() == 0)) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end $core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('style.vm')
    #if ($customFeatureStrategy == 'exclude') #if ($contentFeatures && $contentFeatures.Count > 0) #set ($featureCount = $contentFeatures.Count) $core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('feature.vm') #else $core_v2_widget.hide() #end #elseif ($customFeatureStrategy == 'includeOnly') #if ($customFeatures && $customFeatures.Count() > 0) #set ($featureCount = $customFeatures.Count()) $core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('custom.vm') #else $core_v2_widget.hide() #end #elseif ($customFeatureStrategy == 'includeBefore') #if ($customFeatures && $customFeatures.Count() > 0) #set ($featureCount = $featureCount + $customFeatures.Count()) $core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('custom.vm') #end #if ($contentFeatures && $contentFeatures.Count > 0) #set ($featureCount = $featureCount + $contentFeatures.Count) $core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('feature.vm') #end #elseif ($customFeatureStrategy == 'includeAfter') #if ($contentFeatures && $contentFeatures.Count > 0) #set ($featureCount = $featureCount + $contentFeatures.Count) $core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('feature.vm') #end #if ($customFeatures && $customFeatures.Count() > 0) #set ($featureCount = $featureCount + $customFeatures.Count()) $core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('custom.vm') #end #elseif ($customFeatureStrategy == 'noContent') #if ((!$contentFeatures || $contentFeatures.Count == 0) && ($customFeatures && $customFeatures.Count() > 0)) #set ($featureCount = $customFeatures.Count()) $core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('custom.vm') #elseif ($contentFeatures && $contentFeatures.Count > 0) #set ($featureCount = $contentFeatures.Count) $core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('feature.vm') #else $core_v2_widget.hide() #end #end
#if ($featureCount > 1)
Previous #set ($maxFeatutureIndex = $featureCount - 1) #foreach($i in [0..$maxFeatutureIndex]) #beforeall
    #each
  • $core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource("feature"), $i.ToString())
    • #afterall
#end Next
#end
#registerEndOfPageHtml('telligent.evolution.widgets.featuredContentList') #end #registerEndOfPageHtml() #end
scriptedContentFragment.configuration: <propertyGroup id="options" resourceName="Options"> <property id="fragmentHeader" resourceName="CF_Title" dataType="string" defaultValue="${resource:Core_FeaturedContentSlider_Name}" controlType="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.ContentFragmentTokenStringControl, Telligent.Evolution.Platform" /> <property id="customFeatureStrategy" resourceName="customFeatureStrategy" descriptionResourceName="customFeatureStrategy_Description" dataType="string" defaultValue="includeBefore"> <propertyValue value="exclude" resourceName="customFeatureStrategyExclude" /> <propertyValue value="includeOnly" resourceName="customFeatureStrategyIncludeOnly" /> <propertyValue value="includeBefore" resourceName="customFeatureStrategyBefore" /> <propertyValue value="includeAfter" resourceName="customFeatureStrategyAfter" /> <propertyValue value="noContent" resourceName="customFeatureStrategyNoContent" /> </property> <property id="pageSize" resourceName="pageSize" dataType="int" defaultValue="5"> <propertyRule type="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.PropertyRules.MinMaxValueRule, Telligent.Evolution.Platform" minValue="1" maxValue="20" /> </property> <property id="transition" resourceName="transition" dataType="string" defaultValue="transitionAutomatic" controlType="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.PropertyVisibilityValueSelectionControl, Telligent.Evolution.Platform"> <propertyValue value="transitionAutomatic" resourceName="transitionAutomatic" propertiesToShow="duration" /> <propertyValue value="transitionManual" resourceName="transitionManual" propertiesToHide="duration" /> </property> <property id="duration" resourceName="duration" descriptionResourceName="durationDescription" dataType="int" defaultValue="5000" /> <property id="truncateLength" resourceName="truncateLength" dataType="int" defaultValue="100" /> </propertyGroup> <propertyGroup id="layout" resourceName="layout"> <property id="height" resourceName="height" descriptionResourceName="height_description" dataType="int" defaultValue="315" /> <property id="layoutWidth" resourceName="width" descriptionResourceName="width_description" dataType="string" defaultValue="page" controlType="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.PropertyVisibilityValueSelectionControl, Telligent.Evolution.Platform"> <propertyValue value="window" resourceName="layoutWidthWindow" propertiesToShow="foregroundWidth" propertiesToHide="scaleMode,width" /> <propertyValue value="page" resourceName="layoutWidthPage" propertiesToShow="scaleMode,width" propertiesToHide="foregroundWidth" /> </property> <property id="scaleMode" resourceName="scaleMode" descriptionResourceName="scaleMode_desc" dataType="string" defaultValue="crop" controlType="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.PropertyVisibilityValueSelectionControl, Telligent.Evolution.Platform"> <propertyValue value="crop" resourceName="scaleModeCrop" propertiesToShow="" propertiesToHide="width" /> <propertyValue value="scale" resourceName="scaleModeScale" propertiesToShow="width" propertiesToHide="" /> </property> <property id="width" resourceName="proportional_width" descriptionResourceName="proportional_width_description" dataType="int" defaultValue="1060" /> <property id="foregroundWidth" resourceName="foregroundWidth" descriptionResourceName="foregroundWidth_description" dataType="string" defaultValue="page"> <propertyValue value="window" resourceName="layoutWidthWindow" /> <propertyValue value="page" resourceName="layoutWidthPage" /> </property> <property id="alignment" resourceName="alignment" descriptionResourceName="alignment_description" dataType="string" defaultValue="center-center"> language.resource: Displays a slider of featured content or custom widget-defined items for the current community and child communities
Custom features are defined by this widget instance and are separate from site content marked to be featured.
Include custom features after featured content
Include custom features before featured content
Include custom features only if there is no featured content
Use either color or a photo as the default feature background.
Length (in ms) to display each slide when automatically transitioning
Image used as a background for the feature. Text should not be placed on this image as it will be cropped when rendered to mobile devices.
In window width, foreground content can expand to the full width or retain the page width.
The height of the feature rendering and the feature image (if defined).
Choose a color palette or create a custom one.
Blur background photos to improve foreground legibility
Background photo when not defined by a feature.
When scaling, the original width is required
In page width when the widget is resized for smaller screens, it either retain the full original widget's aspect ratio, or crop it horizontally.
Darken the background photo corresponding to the foreground position.
为当前社区和子社区显示专题内容滑块或由小组件定义的自定义项目的滑块
自定义专题由该小组件实例定义，且独立于标记要成为专题内容的网站内容。
在专题内容后包含%E8%87%AA定义专题
在专题内容前包含自定义专题
仅当没有专题内容时才包含自定义专题
自动切换时每个滑块的显示时长(以毫秒为单位)
用作专题背景的图像。在移动设备上呈现时将裁剪该图像，因此不应当将文本放置到该图像上。
专题呈现和专题图像的高度(如果定义)。
要显示的专题内容项目
专题图像的宽度。在将专题内容滑块放置到非标准区域中或者自定义网站宽度时进行调整。
顯示目前社群和子社群的精選內容或自訂 Widget 定義項目滑桿
自訂功能是由此 Widget 執行個體所定義，並與標示為精選的網站內容區隔開來。
包含精選內容之後的自訂功能
包含精選內容之前的自訂功能
只有在沒有精選內容時才包含自訂功能
自動轉場時每張投影片所顯示的時間長度 (分鐘)
做為功能背景使用的影像。文字不可置於此影像上，因為在行動裝置上呈現時會裁切文字。
功能呈現和精選影像的高度 (如果有定義)。
要顯示的精選內容項目
在重疊文字上加入陰影
精選影像的寬度。如果精選內容滑桿置於非標準區域或網站寬度為自訂時進行調整。
